about_the_game:
This is a VR adventure type game in which you play as a brave pilot who drives a sleigh through a world full of icebergs and snow on a polar expedition.



The world in the game is harsh, the weather changes frequently, the wind blows the snowflakes towards you, and the visibility in the air is very low. In this difficult environment, you'll need to use your keen observation and reflexes to pay attention to obstacles around you and avoid hitting rocks on the side of the road. At the same time, you also need to control the balance of the sled, otherwise it is easy to overturn.
The visuals in the game are very realistic, making you feel like you're in a polar world of ice and snow. You can seem to feel the howling of the wind and the sound of snowflakes, as well as the sound of sleds gliding on the ice, making you even more immersed in this world of ice and snow.
All in all, it's a very exciting game that makes you feel the hardships and pleasures of exploring the polar regions. If you like extreme thrills, then this game is not to be missed.

How it works:

Move Forward/Backward ： L/R-handle up/down
Turn ： L/R- handle left/right
Quit ： Menu key
Reset ： L/R-handle grip

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE

short_description: This is a VR adventure type game in which you play as a brave pilot who drives a sleigh through a world full of icebergs and snow on a polar expedition.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
